modName: SKSE SteamLauncher for ModOrganizer and NMM
summary: Enables you to launch the game via Steam while still being able to use Script Extenders and or Mod Organizer
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=5][u][b]SteamLauncher for SKSE, Versions for ModOrganizer and Standard[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000]EDIT:My bad I forgot to change the start application for the mod organizer version, UPDATE will fix this[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][size=5][u]Purpose:[/u][/size][/color]
[size=3]This mod enables you to launch SKSE with or without Mod Organizer via Steam without having to touch a thing, ideal for controller users, in-home streaming, big picture or just as a simple shortcut to save time.[/size]

[u][b][color=#f9cb9c][size=4]SKSE Already Do This?[/size][/color][/b][/u][size=3]
Yes and no, yes it does let you load SKSE through the default launcher
But no you still need to hit play button on the menu to actually play which is not controller friendly, time waster and also don't forget the launcher also edits ini files that may contain important presets for ENB's etc.
For ModOrganizer users this is the only solution I know of to do so hence why I created this program[/size]

[u][color=#f6b26b][size=5]How it works?[/size][/color][/u]
[list]
[*][size=3]It first re-names the executable that Steam uses to launch the game (SkyrimLauncher.exe)[/size]
[*][size=3]It then re-names itself to (SkyrimLauncher.exe) so that when you click play in steam it opens my loader[/size]
[*][size=3]At this point my program opens either SKSE or SKSE via ModOrganizer depending on what file you download[/size]
[/list]
[color=#ffe599][size=5][u]Mod Organiser Installation:[/u][/size][/color]
[size=3]It's a semi automatic install although you have to create the mod organizer links yourself/rename and place them in the correct location[/size][list=1]
[size=3]
[/size][*][size=3]Open Mod Organizer, select the SKSE executable from the drop down list[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][*][size=3]Then choose Shortcut >> Desktop[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][*][size=3]Move the newly created link on your desktop to your Skyrim install folder, Make sure the shortcut is be named (SKSE) if not rename it[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][*][size=3]Launch SteamLauncherSKSEMO.exe and it will guide you through setup, once complete you can launch Skyrim normally via Steam[/size]
[/list]
[u][color=#ffe599][size=5]FalloutNV Version:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/59352][size=4]SteamLauncher for NVSE and FNV4GB and ModOrganizer[/size][/url]
[/color][/u][size=3]
[/size]
author: thedevil5600
